title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Cursed by Light Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Netflix
text: The Seven Deadly Sins : Cursed by Light is a Japanese animated fantasy action film based on the manga series of the same name written and illustrated by Nakaba Suzuki. The narrative revolves around Meliodas and his companions as they set out on a new adventure when a terrifying conspiracy threatens to disrupt the new era of peace. Here’s how you can watch and stream The Seven Deadly Sins: Cursed by Light via streaming services such as Netflix. Yes, The Seven Deadly Sins: Cursed by Light is available to watch via streaming on Netflix. This film debuted on Netflix on October 1, 2021. Shinyo Kondo is the cinematographer and Keiko Onodera is the editor of this movie. It is directed by Takayuki Hamana and written by Rintarō Ikeda. The cast of The Seven Deadly Sins: Cursed by Light includes Yuki Kaji as Meliodas, Sora Amamiya as Elizabeth Liones, Misaki Kuno as Hawk, Aoi Yūki as Diane, Tatsuhisa Suzuki as Ban, Jun Fukuyama as King, Yuhei Takagi as Gowther, Maaya Sakamoto as Merlin, Tomokazu Sugita as Escanor, Yuki Kaji as Zeldris, Yuko Kaida as Gelda, Mamoru Miyano as Wild, and more. The Seven Deadly Sins: Cursed by Light is available to watch on Netflix. Netflix boasts an expansive library that includes thousands of television shows, movies, and original programming. With a diverse and constantly expanding collection of content, Netflix remains a popular choice for a wide range of viewers seeking entertainment across various genres. You can watch via Netflix by following these steps: The cheapest Netflix Standard with Ads Plan provides all but a few of its movies and TV shows. However, it will show ads before or during most of its content. You can watch in Full HD and on two supported devices at a time. Its Standard Plan provides the same but is completely ad-free while also allowing users to download content on two supported devices with an additional option to add one extra member who doesn’t live in the same household. The Premium Plan provides the same as above, though for four supported devices at a time, with content displaying in Ultra HD. Users get to download content on up to six supported devices at a time and have the option to add up to two extra members who don’t live in the same household. Netflix spatial audio is also supported. The Seven Deadly Sins: Cursed by Light synopsis is as follows: “With the help of the “Dragon Sin of Wrath” Meliodas and the worst rebels in history, the Seven Deadly Sins, the “Holy War”, in which four races, including Humans, Goddesses, Fairies and Giants fought against the Demons, is finally over. At the cost of the “Lion Sin of Pride” Escanor’s life, the Demon King was defeated and the world regained peace. After that, each of the Sins take their own path.” NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
